MATIAS VORNANEN

Hello, nice to have you come to read my page

Hi! My name is Matias Vornanen and I am 26 years old. I am currently studying information and communication technology at Häme University of Applied Sciences on the Riihimäki campus. I am nearing the end of my studies and I am interested in web technologies. I am very fascinated by the making and visual side of the website. I like to make hobby based websites in my spare time as well as 3D modeling various works. From these leisure activities I have gained motivation and interest in studying web technologies and I would like to work in a good company in the future, where I could learn more and delve deeper into the subject. In my free time I like sports, my favorite hobby is basketball, which I have been playing since 2000. I still play on a basketball team called Lost boys with the same playmates with whom I started playing basketball. Harrastan myös frisbeegolfia, ulkona liikkumista ja muita palloilu lajeja. In my free time I have read and studied computer science myself. I’m interested in learning a lot more and I like to watch and watch related videos on YouTube as well as search the web for more information as I develop.
